inclusion.criterion: CKD stage III (GFR 30-59 ml/min/1,73 m2) and uric acid < 7 mg/dl
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient with asymptomatic hyperuricemia, uric acid > 7 mg/dl with normal renal function
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient with BMI>30 without metabolic syndrome
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Normal healthy control- healthy persons( without renal disease, cardiovascular diseases, diabetes mellitus, BMI < 25;normotensives )
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Group II Patients with CKD stage III (GFR 30-59 ml/min/1,73 m2) and uric acid > 7 mg/dl without diabetes mellitus proteinuria < 3,5 g/24 h without immunosuppressives agents, ACEi, ARB, allopurinol treatment well controlled hypertension ( < 140/90 mmHg)
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Patient with CKD stage III(GFR 30-59 ml/min/1,73 m2) and uric acid > 7 mg/dl without diabetes mellitus proteinuria < 3,5 g/24 h without immunosuppressive agents, ACEi, ARB, allopurinol treatment well controlled hypertension ( < 140/90 mmHg)
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: immunosuppressive agents, ACEi, ARB, allopurinol treatment
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has type 1 diabetes confirmed with molecular analysis 7 years ago and is being treated with ACE inhibitors and Beta blockers. He also takes insulin and vitamin D supplements.
